---
id: delete-user-account
title: "Delete user account"
description: "The API allow to delete or deactivate the user account. The status field determines weather the user details will be deleted or deactivated."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete user account"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/userDetails/deleteUserAccount"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API allow to delete or deactivate the user account. The status field determines weather the user details will be deleted or deactivated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

          required={false}

          qualifierMessage={undefined}

        >
